subject: Dear Sir,
body:
Dear Sir,
 
Permit me to introduce myself, I am Gerry B Valenciano (Mr), President/CEO, PNB Capital & Investment Corp (PNB Capital), Philippine National Bank, Pres. Diosdado Macapagal Boulevard, Pasay City Philippines 1300. I handle all our Investor's Direct Capital Funds and secretly extract 1.2% Excess Maximum Return Capital Profit (EMRCP) per annum on each of the Investor's Capital Funds. As an expert, I have made $ 16 million from Investor's EMRCP and hereby looking for someone to trust who will stand as an Investor to receive the funds as Tenure Investment Proceeds.
A brief history of funds: I have more than 208 Corporate Investors attached to my portfolio whose Capital Investment Funds are being managed and administered by me. This Capital Investment fund has a value of over US$ 19.2 billion net. The US$19.2B is used for trading in Stock Market, Crude Oil, and Lending with Profit Returns. At the end of the year, each corporate investor is expected to receive interest from his total Investment Capital Funds. However, I make an excess of 1.2% from the Investor's Investment Capital Funds annually which have exceeded our targeted 20% of Total Investment Capital Funds.
This extra  1.2% from the 21.2% is being retained by me as my personal profits for managing the Capital Investment. However, I cannot claim these funds without presenting someone to stand as an Investor otherwise our establishment will convert the funds into the company's treasury. This is why I have come to you for the deal to take place.
This is a fair deal without any risk attached either on your part or on my part as long as we comply with the laws governing the claiming of funds in our establishment.
If Interested Please Send me your full name, address, and Telephone number, so that the attorney can start putting together the necessary paperwork that would facilitate the release of the money to you.
Please reply via my Private Email: 
gvalencianob@outlook.com
Kind regards,
Gerry B Valenciano (Mr)

subject: Re: Dear Sir,
body:
Dear Mr. Valenciano,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this opportunity. I must say, it sounds quite intriguing. I would be interested in learning more about how this investment works and what the potential returns could be.

Could you please provide me with some additional details? How much capital would be required from my end? And what is the expected timeframe for receiving the investment proceeds?

I appreciate your time and look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Lori

subject: THANKS FOR YOUR RESPONSE
body:
Dear Sir,

This is to acknowledge the receipt of your correspondence and enclosed information.  Rest assured you wouldn't be brought into odium as a reason of this transaction or your association with me.

 I am happy that you are willing to work with me in this transaction. I pray that you see this transaction in the light of its attendant benefit as I am simply inviting you to share and uphold the level of wealth that you might not have in a whole lifetime for a better life for our kids and yet unborn. I have decided to explain to you in detail to enable you to have 100% comfortability toward this dream of ours. We have to work fast to achieve our objective within the next 10 banking days as earlier indicated.

 I am so happy to work with you if you are ready to keep this transaction very confidential the code of this operation is "Partnership protection first", Live a low-key lifestyle, and remember, "Loose Lips Sink Ships". You and I have the capability to accomplish this project and you must see this as a sensitive project for which I will be spending so much money and making so many commitments. I therefore insist on strict confidentiality and believe that you can be trusted with the same. The need for confidentiality in all matters relating to this transaction is of great importance, as a loose lip is the elements of foreseeable failure please take note of this all-time, I don’t not want to have any problems towards the end of this transaction due to my position in my bank here in the Philippines.

Also know that this is a capital investment funds, which was invested by foreigner as details in my emails to you, all documents will be release by my bank as soon as the funds are release in your name , all I need from you is the trust and also let me lead this transaction to avoid any mistakes and without us both seeing and assessing the situation through the same lenses there cannot and will never be success or progress. So, as we say in Filipino “one foot cannot stand on two boats “so a decisive and clear mind is what is needed here. I need you to follow and adhere to my every instruction and do exactly as I will advise for success to be gained. You must let me direct this project for us to have achieved the step by step anticipated procedures to ensure the success, and I want to assure you that there is no possibility of law prosecution for us for any reason, this is an issue of Investment funds and the attorney will prepare the necessary paperwork which shall legally put you in place as the bona-fide beneficiary to receiving the money in your names, he will obtain the necessary clearances which will cover all the aspects involved in this transaction from the Philippines authorities including the Justice department here. I have been a professional banker for many years and I know perfectly how the system works here.

I will also be very forthright with you as per the process and cost. We have to embrace the reality that this transaction would cost a limited amount of money because I will not want a situation where you see that as we are in the process of making this take the semblance of a legitimate transaction that you are not financially able to support.

I must be honest with you so we do not waste each other’s time, there is no way you and I will partner in this operation without spending money, it is not possible.  A transaction of this magnitude must be expensive to execute. If we say we aren't spending money, then we are not ready, and the transaction would be looking us in the face, and no progress made because it is capital intensive. I do not want to hide anything from you because I equally do not like surprises. It is better you know and back out now, than for me to lead you on and then start bringing up surprises. You and I will spend money to get this deal done. The opening an account with an offshore bank in your name for the initial receipt of these funds before you start moving it in safe bit to your home account will be your full responsibility.

At this time, I do not have any access to the big money in question, so all documentations of claim I will be filing in your name as the beneficiary would be done from my personal pocket. I will be paying for it all. I am taking upon myself all other expenses - (Documentations fees, Attorney retainer fees, fee for filing application for a grant of all required documents and transfer fees to be charged to move the entire funds from my bank, local travel expenses, not to mention miscellaneous expenses). I shall take care of all expenses at my end; please you should be able to take care of all expenses at your end in having your offshore account ready in your name to receive these funds, If you find this impossible to handle, then we can close this topic immediately but please, do not destroy me because of this sensitive information I have divulged to you.

I have set some amount aside and would like you to do the same. I honestly don’t want to bring you into a transaction to inconvenience you, but to expose you to wealth, that before now might not have aspired to attain. I imagine that you might not be comfortable with the reality that it will cost money as like every other being we desire windfall without considering the hard challenge that might be required. In my calculation I have proposed to cater for the expenses, you might say that I am unsympathetic in exposing you to reality but I tell you I am a good man that works for results. I do not want a situation where we are emotionally alleviated and in the end we are downtrodden with disenchantment resulting from a deadlock created by lack of funds.

We must plan and clearly express the manner we truly believe we can attain a 100% risk free actualization. This in my view is the honest position. Please feel free to express yourself without any reservations.  I hope we are able to agree. Once we are confident, we would be able to shoulder all the responsibilities that we envisage we can go ahead, with me investing on the paper work with my funds and as we go on towards completion and my resources get consumed you can deploy your financial support. It is also possible that my resources can provide for everything.

OPTION 1:
I am presently investigating an offshore bank that has a very close correspondent relationship with my bank, so you will need to open an online/offshore account in your name with this offshore bank. So that once the funds are released, they will be moved straight into the offshore bank account, and secured for both of us. After which you can begin to transfer our various shares in safe bits into our designated personal bank accounts as I will direct.

OPTION 2:
Once the funds are released by my bank, I can arrange for them to be moved to our affiliate security/finance company in Europe, but in this case, your physical presence will be needed to sign the release document. If required, the security company will release the funds to you, assist you in setting up an account with any bank of your choice, and ensure a smooth deposit of the entire funds into the bank account, and then you can begin to transfer our various shares in safe bits into our designated personal bank accounts.

I am ready to invest my share in real estate and hotels and resorts or any lucrative investment in your country or neighbouring countries. My friend, please let us be positive and show discretion as we both make one of the most fruitful steps of our lives. I will also appreciate you tell me more about yourself, family and business.
If you are interested in my proposal kindly transmit your information to enable us proceed i.e


  1.  Your Full Name
  2.  Address:
  3.  Tel No. (mobile preferably)

If you have any questions, feel free to ask me before we proceed. NOTE: For security purposes in our email correspondence, I would appreciate that you input this code: [CIF-M3T] in all email messages directed to me.

Attached is the bio-data page of my international passport .
Best regards,
Gerry B V (Mr)
[CIF-M3T]

subject: Re: THANKS FOR YOUR RESPONSE
body:
Dear Gerry Mr,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this opportunity. I appreciate your willingness to work together and share in the potential wealth that this venture may bring. I understand the importance of maintaining confidentiality and ensuring the success of our project.

I have read through your detailed explanation and I am interested in learning more about the steps we need to take to achieve our objective within the next banking days. Could you please provide me with more information on how we can proceed?

I also want to assure you that I understand the need for trust and discretion in this matter. As you mentioned, loose lips can indeed sink ships, so I will be cautious in discussing this with anyone else.

Regarding the financial aspect, I understand that there may be costs involved in executing a project of this magnitude. However, before proceeding further, could you please clarify what these expenses entail? It would be helpful for me to have a clear understanding of what is expected from my end.

Furthermore, I would like to know more about your background as well. Could you please share some information about yourself, your family, and your business? This will help me get a better sense of who I am working with.

Lastly, for security purposes as you mentioned, could you please provide me with the code that needs to be included in all email messages directed to you?

Thank you once again for considering me as a partner in this endeavor. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Lori

subject: AWAITING YOUR RESPONSE
body:
Dear Lori,

Thanks for your correspondence.

From the ID I transmitted to you, you can see I am 59, - Nationality: Philippines- Married to Nestoria with four children.

Religion : Christian. I am a banker with one of the big banks here in the Philippines. First Senior Vice President, Chief of Staff to the President & CEO, Philippine National Bank.


I handle all our Investor's Direct Capital Funds for foreign investors and secretly extract 1.2% Excess Maximum Return Capital Profit (EMRCP) per annum on each of the Investor's Capital Funds. As an expert, I have made $26Million from Investor's EMRCP and hereby looking for someone to trust who will stand as an Investor to receive the funds as Tenure Investment Proceeds.



Brief history of funds: I have more than 208 Corporate Investors attached to my portfolio whose Capital Investment Funds are being managed and administered by me. This Capital Investment Funds has a value of over US$19.2Billion net. The US$19.2B is used for trading in Stock Market, Crude Oil and Lending with Profit Returns. Every end of year, each corporate investor is expected to receive interest from his total Investment Capital Funds. However, I make an excess of 1.2% from the Investor's Investment Capital Funds annually which have exceeded our targeted 20% of Total Investment Capital Funds.



This extra of 1.2% from the 21.2% is being retained by me as my personal profits for managing the Capital Investment. However, I cannot claim these funds without presenting someone to stand as an Investor otherwise our establishment will convert the funds into the company's treasury. This is why I have come to you for the deal to take place.



Regarding cost   I will hire an attorney to prepare the required documents to designate you as the investor of the Capital Investment Deposit. This will enable you to receive the tenure investment proceeds. The attorney will submit an application of claims to the holding financial institution, presenting you as the investor, along with any other necessary legal documents. After the required documentation has been reviewed and approved, the funds will be released to you.



As a top banking executive, I have extensive experience in investment advisory and portfolio management, and based on this experience, I am confident that we can withdraw the funds without any problems. Your obligation in this transaction is to agree to act as an investor of the capital funds and open an on-line bank account with a bank that shares similar BANK IDENTIFIER CODE (B.I.C) with my bank. You will need to open a temporary account with this Bank so that when the transfer of our funds are approved by my Bank here in Philippines, it  will be transfer to your new account with the bank, and the transfer transaction will be seen as an in-house affair thereby bypassing all eyebrows and questions from the monetary authorities in Europe, Persian Gulf States, Asia, North and South America etc. The opening of this on-line account will be strictly your responsibility. I must also inform you that my greatest achievement lies in our ability to enjoy the proceeds of this transaction with complete peace of mind. I want to assure you that all the modalities for the release have been well studied and will obtain the necessary clearances documents which will cover all the aspects involved in this transaction from the Philippines authorities including the Justice department here and I can guarantee confidently the release of the fund if we both collaborate and work as a team.

For us to proceed please transmit your details as earlier requested ie:

Your Full Names:
Address:
Tel number: (Mobile preferably)

Note: we might have to draft and sign a Memorandum of Understanding that will guide our business relationship now and in the future.


Our Code is [CIF-M3T] please affix in the beginning or the end of your correspondence.
Best regards,

Gerry B V (Mr)
[CIF-M3T]

subject: Re: AWAITING YOUR RESPONSE
body:
Dear Gerry Mr,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this opportunity. I must say, it sounds quite intriguing. I have a few questions before we proceed:

1. Could you please provide more details about the Investor's Direct Capital Funds? How exactly do they work and what is the expected return on investment?

2. You mentioned that an attorney will be involved in preparing the necessary documents. Can you clarify who will cover the cost of hiring the attorney?

3. I understand that opening a temporary bank account is required, but could you explain why it needs to have a similar BANK IDENTIFIER CODE as your bank? Is there any specific reason for this requirement?

4. What kind of timeframe are we looking at for the funds to be released once all the necessary documents are submitted and approved?

I appreciate your patience in answering these questions. I want to ensure that I fully understand the process before moving forward.

Best wishes,
Lori

subject: THANKS
body:
Dear Lori,

Thanks for your prompt response.


  1.
  Under this Direct investment Capital Fund, Investing companies or individual do not necessarily have to buy regular shares of a company's stock. Direct investment provides a company with capital funding. In return investors get a long-term equity interest. The most common way to repay investors is through dividends. Dividends are payments made to shareholders out of a company's profits. They can be paid out in cash or in shares of stock, and they're typically paid out on a quarterly basis.


         2. As indicated in my previous correspondence, all the cost will be on me, except the opening and activation of the on-line                   bank account will be strictly personal to you and your responsibility.

          3.  This is necessary as it will seem an in-house affair and will not attract fund movement monitoring agencies. And from
                this account you will gradually move the fund in safe bits to your home account.

         4.  I think not later than 10 banking days will be enough to finalize this transaction. That is, 10 banking days after the receipt
               of the bank coordinates of the new account, you will open and operate.

If these is ok by you, transmit your detail and lets proceed.

Have a nice day.
Best regards,
Gerry B V (Mr)
[CIF-M3T]

subject: Re: THANKS
body:
Dear Lori,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your explanation about the Direct Investment Capital Fund. It sounds interesting, but I have a few questions before proceeding.

1. How long has this fund been in operation?
2. What is the minimum investment required?
3. Can you provide some examples of companies that have benefited from this fund in the past?
4. Are there any risks involved with this type of investment?

I look forward to hearing back from you and learning more about this opportunity.

Best wishes,
Lori

subject: Re: THANKS
body:
Dear Lori,

Good day. I think we have done a lot of questioning and answers. If you are interested in this transaction, please transmit your details lets proceed.

Thanks.

Gerry B

subject: Re: THANKS
body:
Dear Gerry,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm definitely interested in learning more about what you have to offer. Could you please provide me with some additional details about the opportunity? What exactly is it that you're offering?

I appreciate your time and look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Lori

subject: Re: THANKS
body:
Dear Lori,

Frankly I do not think you are serious about this transaction. I have told all that need to be done in details.

Go through my correspondences.
Best regards,
Gerry B

subject: Re: THANKS
body:
Dear Lori,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm always interested in learning new things and sharing information. What is it that you would like to discuss or share with me?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Lori
